definitions.title: vb. Niph.
definitions.body: belightly esteemed, dishonoured (‖ form of [[קלל]]; cf. NH [[קָלוֹן]], Targum [[קְלנׇא]] disgrace, shame);—Pf.  3 ms. consec. [[וְנִקְלָה]] Is 16:14, De 25:3; Pt. [[נִקְלֶה]] Is 3:5 + 2 t.;—be lightly esteemed, held of little account, Is 16:14 (glory of Moab); [[אִישׁ רָשׁ וְנִקְלֶה]] 1Sa 18:23; so (Pt. as subst.) Is 3:5 (opp. [[נִכְבָּד]]), Pr 12:9 (opp. [[מִתְכַּבֵּד]]); more positively, be dishonoured, degraded, De 25:3 ([[עֵינֶיךָ]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: treat with contempt, dishonour, Pt. ´[[מַקְלֶה אָבִיו וגו]]: De 27:16 one dis-honouring [i.e. opp. [[כַּבֵּד]] of 5th Command].
